name: Castle Quest
overview: Meet Honest Lez, one time plumber now turned hero with a mission to rescue his love, Maid Margaret from the clutches of the evil Baron. Our Maiden has been locked up in a high tower and the key has conveniently gone missing which leaves Lez searching for the Golden Ladder ( the only one long enough to reach the tower). Now you must guide Lez on his quest but beware once friendly animals are now not so friendly and who knows what lurks in some of the old castles...
